title: Nob Hill Beautiful Update Furnished 1Br (can use for 2Br)
posting_body: This well preserved victorian era apartment design with a minimalist interior will give you the full SF experience.
This furnished apartment comes with everything you need, and is set up for a 1-year lease.
This is a large One bedroom that features a full kitchen, WiFi (Blazing fast speeds up to 800MBP/s), Smart TV with Amazon Fire remote, Comfortable Tuft and Needle Queen-sized Bed and more.

Located in the Heart of San Francisco, Nob Hill is centrally located amongst famous neighborhoods such as North beach, Chinatown, Downtown, Polk Street, Fisherman's Wharf, and Financial District just minutes walking distance away!
THIS ONE BEDROOM AND LIVING ROOM EACH HAS DOORS FOR PRIVACY ( CAN USED FOR 2 BEDROOMS GOOD FOR ROOM MATS SITUATION).
As you enter the neighborhood, you are greeted by SF's amazing cityscape, Bay views and gorgeous Bay bridge day and night!
Walk just few blocks away to some of the best scenic attractions, cafes and restaurants, SF has to offer!
